cast.original_title: Indagine su un cittadino al di sopra di ogni sospetto
cast.overview: Rome, Italy. After committing a heinous crime, a senior police officer exposes evidence incriminating him because his moral commitment prevents him from circumventing the law and the social order it protects.
cast.title: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion

details.biography: Fulvio Grimaldi was born on 12 May 1934 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy. He is an actor, known for Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion (1970), Deaf Smith & Johnny Ears (1973) and Bogside Story (2018).
details.name: Fulvio Grimaldi
